name: Super Mogul 64
description:
Jump King but also SM64 but also scuffed

A, D - Move sideways
SPACE - Jump
Shift - Crouch

- Hold jump to jump higher
- Jump twice rapidly to do a DOUBLE JUMP
- Jump three times rapidly to do a TRIPLE JUMP
- Run to the opposite direction and then jump to do a SIDEFLIP
- Crouch and jump to do a LONG JUMP

== secret stuffs==
- Press "L" to disable lighting, drastically increase fps
- Press "K" to restart the game
- You can also just download the .EXE for better performance and stability

== SUPER secret stuffs ==
- If you're really struggling and just want to see the rest of the level, you can press "P" to save and "O" to load.
But before giving up, I strongly recommend to just beat the game normally and try to look for shortcuts, believe me there are plenty :D

== CREDITS ==

songs-Bonfire, Modern Time, Night Run Away, Time to Spare (ALL made by An Jone)
